use.flag: Applies reverts for 194529c7 and 715cfbf5 to fix the Failed to create query: No WiFi devices available problem.
Enable geolocation through 3G or GPS enabled hardware through net-misc/modemmanager.
Enable retrieval of GPS location from Android devices with https://wiki.gnome.org/Apps/GeoclueShare

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This temporary fork exist to get geolocation working on webkit-gtk. It may be removed once the following regression is resolved for 2.5.7 resolved upstream:
Failed to create query: No WiFi devices available is fixed
